description: A wholesome and heart warming dish packed with chicken and vegetables and a creamy potato topping.
keywords: Shepherd's & cottage pie,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken,Potato,Peanut free
name: Chicken Shepherds Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g chicken breasts, diced and no skin or bone
1 large white onion, peeled and diced
2 stalks celery, leaves removed and sliced
700g potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large pan to a medium heat and then add the oil.
Fry the onion, garlic, carrot and celery for 4 minutes while tossing.
Add the diced chicken and herbs and fry for a further 6 minutes while mixing.
Add the chicken stock and allow to simmer for 40 minutes stirring occasionally.
Cook the potatoes in a pot of salted water for 20 minutes or until soft.
Remove the potatoes from the heat, drain the liquid and mash with a potato masher with the butter, salt and pepper.
In a suitable baking dish, empty the chicken mixture to the bottom and then top that with the potatoes.
Grill in the oven for 10 minutes or until the potatoes start to brown nicely before serving.
